item.title: Info2 SS2014 Schedule
item.description: Stand: 1.4.2014 Week KW Lab (Group1) Lecture Wed Lecture Fri - Lecture Topic Lab No Lab Topic 1 14 04/02/2014 “Welcome Back, Overview, Toolbox: Java, Eclipse, GIT” 04/04/2014 “Designing Applications” 2 15 04/08/2014 1 “Designing an Application, CRC Cards & Toolbox” 04/09/2014 “Error Handling and Exceptions” 04/11/2014 “Networking in Java. File I/O. Eclipse.” 3 16 04/15/2014 2 “Implementing CRC cards (Pre-Lab!)” 04/16/2014 “Java 8 - Lambdas” 04/18/2014 “Properties of Algorithms” 4 17 04/22/2014 3 “Chatterbox (Pre-Lab!
